With the feature matrixΦ deﬁned in (9.16), the negative log-likelihood
for the linear regression model (9.13) can be written as
−log p(Y|X ,θ) = 1

Comparing (9.18) with the negative log-likelihood in (9.10b) for the “fea-
ture-free” model, we immediately see we just need to replace Xwith Φ.
